inclusion.criterion: Vitamin D level less than 20 ng/dl
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The serum alkaline phosphatase is 300 IU/L (the normal range is 44- 147 IU/L).

exclusion.criterion: Vitamin D deficiency (VDD) has resurfaced as a significant public health problem in recent years.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prevalence of VDD of 92% and 81% in ambulatory patients has been reported from centers in Karachi and Lahore recently.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient's sister had the same problems. She was diagnosed with Paget's disease of bone when she was 52 years old.
